channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Threatens to Impose New Tariffs on China and Cancel Meeting With Xi
item.description: The president proposed economic retaliation after Beijing imposed new restrictions on the export of rare earth minerals, which are vital supplies for ...

item.title: María Corina Machado Wins Nobel Peace Prize Despite Trump’s Campaign
item.description: Ms. Machado galvanized a movement that independent analysts say won last year’s election, only to have it stolen by President Nicolás Maduro.

item.title: S&P and Nasdaq Slump as Stocks Fall on Trump China Tariff Threat
item.description: The S&P 500 slumped more than 2 percent for the first time in six months, rattling investors after a long stretch of gains.

item.title: Trump claims China holding the world ‘hostage’ on rare earths is ‘especially inappropriate’ after Gaza peace deal
item.description: Markets had their hopes up on trade peace between China and the U.S. That was shattered on Friday.

item.title: Macron Reappoints Sébastien Lecornu as France’s Prime Minister
item.description: President Emmanuel Macron is trying to steady the political turmoil that has gripped the country and jeopardized the passage of a budget.

item.title: The E.P.A. Followed Up on an Unusual Request About Abortion Pills
item.description: Scientists at the Environmental Protection Agency found that they could develop methods to identify traces of the medication if necessary — a practice...

item.title: Billionaire MacKenzie Scott doubles down on DEI with $42 million donation
item.description: In a signal to nonprofits and boardrooms, the Yield Giving philanthropist is backing diversity and equity with no‑strings grants—building on more than...

item.title: Lay’s drastically rebrands after disturbing finding: 42% of consumers didn’t know they were made out of potatoes
item.description: New bags—matte-ified and designed to look like wood planks (like a potato crate)—will hold the chips with revamped ingredient lists.

item.title: The U.S. and South Korea need to salvage their tariff and investment agreement—for the sake of the alliance
item.description: Seoul and Washington must see disagreements on investment and immigration as an opportunity to fine-tune a trade agreement they can both tolerate.

item.title: A 3-person policy non-profit that worked on California’s AI safety law is publicly accusing OpenAI of intimidation tactics
item.description: In a widely read post on social media, the general counsel of Encode said OpenAI used subpoenas and political muscle to intimidate the firm and to und...

item.title: France’s Domestic Instability Has Weakened Its Diplomatic Clout
item.description: President Emmanuel Macron’s inability to find a government that can pass a new budget is hobbling his efforts to influence Europe’s agenda.

item.title: Map: 7.6-Magnitude Earthquake Strikes the South Atlantic Ocean
item.description: View the location of the quake’s epicenter and shake area.

item.title: Macron Reappoints Sébastien Lecornu as France’s Prime Minister
item.description: President Emmanuel Macron is trying to steady the political turmoil that has gripped the country and jeopardized the passage of a budget.
